name: Once you drive, Once you kill, Once you Die - 7dfps 2022
name_original: Once you drive, Once you kill, Once you Die - 7dfps 2022
description:
This is my entry for a 7DFPS game-jam - https://itch.io/jam/7dfps-2022

Controlls: W/A/S/D + Mouse + LeftClick (you can pause with ESCAPE if needed) Endings! There are 4 possible ways to end the game. (except just leaving, haha)

I have spent 40 hours in total on this project in these 7 days. But actually, most of my work was done in the last 24 hours without sleeping. Please, enjoy your time :))

If you record any video on this game, please post it in the comment section, I'm super curious! 👾

If you liked the game, which I would be glad for, and wish to support me, check my profile, there are some links ;)

Please, if you have ANY feedback, please let me know what you think, every feedback counts!

License: 

You may not reupload, resell or redistribute the game.
